plugin.comment: While represented as an enum, it is actually an index to the "HUD Shaders" block in CHGD.
Only select "Use Parent Widget" for a Bitmap or Text Widget, otherwise the game will crash.
These will only function with the placement anchor value set to Grenade A/B/C/D.

Things to note about them: -Only 1 condition needs to match per flags for the game to count it. Split the flags between the parent and bitmap/text widgets to get around this. -Fields named with "Weapon" only resolve on HUDs referenced by weapons. -Fields named with [Special] mean the widget is always visible by default, but play a specific animation if a match occurs. -Fields named with [Brief] mean the widget is always invisible by default, but play a specific animation if a match occurs, then becomes invisible again. -Every other field should behave as an on/off switch for whether or not the widget should be drawn.

tagblock.name: Text Widgets
tagblock.comment: Font Index refers to the order listed in the font_table.txt file. The default is: 0 Fixedsys, 9 1 Conduit, 16 2 Conduit, 32 3 Conduit, 32 4 Conduit, 23 5 Conduit, 12 6 Conduit, 18 7 Lucida Console, 18 8 Conduit, 18 9 Conduit, 16 10 Broadband, 16

This value can be anything from the hud_messages unicode tag, or one of the following, where a-f correspond to Output Scalars a-f in the Render Data block: chud_out_a chud_out_b chud_out_c chud_out_d chud_out_e chud_out_f chud_variant_name chud_talking_player_name chud_arming_meter_name chud_time_left chud_training_text
